title: Steel Dynamics issues below consensus Q3 earnings outlook
content: Steel Dynamics (NASDAQ:STLD) issues Q3 financial projections that fall well short of Wall Street expectations, citing continued low steel prices . STLD projects Q3 EPS of $0.20-$0.24 vs. $0.38 earned in the year-ago period and the analyst consensus estimate of $0.31. Still, STLD says it expects profitability  from its steel operations to improve Q/Q, even as shipments continue to fall amid a global steel  glut and high imports as China’s economy cools. STLD -0.5% AH.
